title: eSIM adoption is on the rise thanks to travel and device compatibility
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: eSIM as a technology has been around for a decade now. However, global eSIM adoption was around 3% last year and will only cross 5% this year. Despite these figures, analysts, eSIM-providing startups, and investors are bullish about eSIM’s upward trajectory, largely thanks to travel.
